message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I know you'll be happy with it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I can't go above $12,000 for this product.
